Key Match Events: 4' Qatar take the lead early on.
14' Afif has been troubling the Indian defence in the first quarter for the match and now sees his shot go over the top of the bar.
23' Amrinder has made amends for his early mistakes as he stopped Afif's shot.
32' Amrinder has pulled off another big save from a corner as Qatar's Mashal from making it 2-0.
47' Immediately after start of the second half, India concedes a goal as Qatar goes 2-0 up in the match.
86' Yusuf Abdurisag scores and that's likely to be the final nail in India's coffin.
Pre-Game Insights: Qatar coach Carlos Queiroz has said that his team is really excited about the match and are happy to be in India.
Igor Stimac urged his players to give it their all in their big-ticket FIFA World Cup 2026 qualifier against heavyweights and Asian champions Qatar at the Kalinga Stadium in Bhubaneshwar.
